name: Lots of Colors
description:
Game:

Mouse Controlled Platformer where you get bonus score in keeping the minimum health and pass level in the last seconds.  

Control:

Mouse Click to push player. 

Story:

Parasites/monsters infect the colourful land with balck and white and climb onto you. You need to get them off before you turn black and white by taking damage, but to do that, you also hurt yourself. So you must hurt yourself to get the monsters off, but make sure you don’t overdo it, or you might end up dead, and if you don’t get them off, you will turn black and white.
